Package Controller

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
Controller.AdminController
public class AdminController extends Object
AdminController is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - AdminView, DisplayStaffView and ManageStaffAccountView and the model class - Admin and Staff.

It can view/add/update/remove staff

Since:
2024-11-17

      Parameters:
      name - the name of the new staff

      gender - the gender of the new staff
      age - the age of the new staff
      hospitalId - the loginId of the new staff
      role - the role of the new staff

      Parameters:
      hospitalID - the targeted staff's login ID
      Returns:
      true if remove successfully. Otherwise, false if staff id is not found

      function to update staff name
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - targeted staff's login id
      name - targeted staff's name
      attributeCode - the attribute code for the detail that user choose to update
      Returns:
      true if update staff is successful. Otherwise, false
